Instruction: In a small bowl, mix together chopped garlic, chopped rosemary, chopped thyme, olive oil, Dijon mustard, salt, and black pepper to create a marinade.
Place the rack of lamb in a roasting pan, fat side up. Pat the lamb dry with paper towels.
Rub the marinade all over the surface of the lamb, coating it evenly.
Place the roasting pan in the preheated oven and roast the lamb for 15 minutes for medium-rare or 20 minutes for medium doneness.
Remove the lamb from the oven and let it rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
After resting, slice the rack of lamb into individual chops and serve hot.
Garnish with additional fresh herbs, if desired, and enjoy your delicious rack of lamb!
